1527530.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Interior Map Pack 2
1527530.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Interior Map Pack 2

The Interior Map Pack 2 features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools. This map package is specifically designed to create additional interior locations such as artisan's work locations, treasure troves, taverns and more.
This pack includes:
  • Brushes designed for use with the line, rectangle, and ellipse tool such as walls, fences, roofs, and more
  • Decorations which include over 400 images or trade tools, containers, furniture, treasure, structure elements and more
  • Floors of many styles and designs
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
